verses.text: Mamin Jehová, t'a smasanil in k'ool ol wak' yuj diosal t'ayach, ol ach in b'itej t'a yichanh juntzanh Dios.

Ol in em cuman t'ayach t'a stojolal a templo to icnhej yaji, yuj wak'an yuj diosal t'ayach yuj a wach'k'olal, yujto tzak'elk'och tas tzala'. Ix ik'chaanh a b'i yet' a lolonel t'a yib'anh masanil tastac.
Ix ach tak'wi t'ayin ayic ix in awaj t'ayach, ix ak'an wip.
Masanil heb' rey t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik, ol yal wach' lolonel heb' t'ayach ayic ol yab'an heb' tas alnaccani.
Ol yal wach' lolonel heb' t'ayach yuj tastac a b'onac, yujto te niwan yelk'och a b'inajnaquil.
Wach'chom te niwan elk'ochi, palta tz'ok' a k'ol t'a heb' anima emnaquil yeq'ui, haxo heb' syik'chaanh sb'a, max ach b'atlaj k'elan t'a heb'.
Ayic ay in ek' t'a skal tas ay smay, pitzan innhej uuj, tzak'ancot a poder, tzin a colanel t'a yowal heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin.
Ach Jehová, ol ach och wed'oc yic wach'nhej tzin elk'och t'a tas tza na t'ayin. Ha a wach'k'olal aynhejek' t'a masanil tiempo. Ha tastac ix ik'el yich t'ayin, mocab' kan xepan.
